snippet.title: The Flintstones (Williams 1994) v1.27 - VR Gameplay
snippet.description:
VR gameplay of the virtual pinball table The Flintstones (Williams 1994) v1.27.

00:00 🥽 Room, playfield and cabinet
01:10 🕹️ Game - 1,035,444,820

Join us on the "Weekly High score Challenge" group to compete for fun!
https://www.facebook.com/groups/wovpwhsc

------------
DOWNLOAD :

------------
CURRENT SETUP :
Headset: HP Reverb G2
Graphic card: NVIDIA 3070
CPU/RAM:  Intel i7-7740X @ 4.30GHz / 16Gb RAM
Recording software: OBS Studio / SteamVR / Legacy Mirror View
Play software: Visual Pinball 10.7 for VR
